inclusion.criterion: willing and able to comply with protocol requirements
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: willing to use acceptable method of birth control
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: male patient agrees to use contraception
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: relapsed or refractory after one or two lines of treatment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: laboratory values within 14 days before Baseline
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: calculated or measured creatinine clearance <20 mL/minute
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with relapse and systemic amyloidosis, on hemodialysis for ESRD. She was treated with various regimens including melphalan, prednisone, VAD, thalidomide, and velcade.
